attributes.action: Realise that we The British Public do not need any more useless legislation, taxes on drinking etc etc. What we do want is; that the Government properly fund the justice system that enforces our current laws. And the the Govenment issues the relevant instructions to the Judicery to employ the tough sentencing that is required. No more nanny state, no more rubbish additions just some tangible action.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick that this Government has spent millions on the NOMS system, millions on pansying around with legislation that it already in place. Soundbites and spin. I want less legislation and more bad people where they can do no more harm. In other words, the zero tolerance that we were all promised with prison spaces that does not rely upon numbers. I would also welcome a vote on capital punishment.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
